name: Githyanki

uniqueFeatures.telekineticLeap: You can use telekinetic leap as an encounter power.
uniqueFeatures.githyankiWillpower: You gain a +1 bonus to your Will defense, and a +2 bonus to saving throws against charm effects.
uniqueFeatures.dangerSense: You have a +2 racial bonus to initiative checks.
